HBase service properties

properties.label: fs.trash.interval
properties.description: Number of minutes after which the checkpoint gets deleted. If zero, the trash feature is disabled.

properties.label: dfs.replication
properties.description: Default block replication.

properties.label: dfs.namenode.handler.count
properties.description: The number of server threads for the namenode.

properties.label: dfs.datanode.handler.count
properties.description: The number of server threads for the datanode.

properties.label: hbase.regionserver.handler.count
properties.description: Count of RPC Listener instances spun up on RegionServers.

properties.label: hbase.master.handler.count
properties.description: Count of RPC Listener instances spun up on Master.

properties.label: zookeeper.session.timeout
properties.description: ZooKeeper session timeout in milliseconds.

properties.label: hbase.hregion.majorcompaction
properties.description: The time (in miliseconds) between 'major' compactions of all HStoreFiles in a region. If zero, the auto majorcompaction is disabled.

properties.label: hbase.hstore.blockingStoreFiles
properties.description: If more than this number of StoreFiles in any one Store then updates are blocked for this HRegion until a compaction is completed.

properties.label: hbase.regionserver.optionalcacheflushinterval
properties.description: Maximum amount of time an edit lives in memory before being automatically flushed. Default 1 hour. Set it to 0 to disable automatic flushing.

properties.label: hfile.block.cache.size
properties.description: Percentage of maximum heap (-Xmx setting) to allocate to block cache used by HFile/StoreFile. Note: hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.size + hfile.block.cache.size <= 0.8.

properties.label: hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.size
properties.description: Maximum size of all memstores in a region server before new updates are blocked and flushes are forced. Note: hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.size + hfile.block.cache.size <= 0.8.

properties.label: hfile.index.block.max.size
properties.description: When block index grows to this size, the block is written out and a new block is started.

properties.label: hbase.hregion.max.filesize
properties.description: Maximum HStoreFile size.

properties.label: hbase.master.logcleaner.ttl
properties.description: Maximum time a WAL can stay in the .oldlogdir directory, after which it will be cleaned by a Master thread.

properties.label: hbase.ipc.server.callqueue.handler.factor
properties.description: Factor to determine the number of call queues. A value of 0 means a single queue shared between all the handlers. A value of 1 means that each handler has its own queue.

properties.label: hbase.ipc.server.callqueue.read.ratio
properties.description: Split the call queues into read and write queues. The specified interval (which should be between 0.0 and 1.0) will be multiplied by the number of call queues.

properties.label: hbase.ipc.server.callqueue.scan.ratio
properties.description: Given the number of read call queues, calculated from the total number of call queues multiplied by the callqueue.read.ratio, the scan.ratio property will split the read call queues into small-read and long-read queues.

properties.label: hbase.regionserver.msginterval
properties.description: Interval between messages from the RegionServer to Master in milliseconds.

properties.label: hbase.regionserver.logroll.period
properties.description: Period at which we will roll the commit log regardless of how many edits it has.

properties.label: hbase.regionserver.regionSplitLimit
properties.description: Limit for the number of regions after which no more region splitting should take place.

properties.label: hbase.balancer.period
properties.description: Period at which the region balancer runs in the Master.

properties.label: hbase.regions.slop
properties.description: Rebalance if any regionserver has average + (average * slop) regions.

properties.label: io.storefile.bloom.block.size
properties.description: The size in bytes of a single block ("chunk") of a compound Bloom filter.

properties.label: hbase.rpc.timeout
properties.description: This is for the RPC layer to define how long (millisecond) HBase client applications take for a remote call to time out.

properties.label: hbase.column.max.version
properties.description: New column family descriptors will use this value as the default number of versions to keep.

properties.label: hbase.security.authorization
properties.description: Enable the security authorization of HBase or not

properties.label: qingcloud.hbase.major.compact.hour
properties.description: Make major compaction at this time, -1 to disable
